title: POLAR BEAR CLUB IN THE HURLEY STUDIOS: SEE THE WIND
description:
Our good friends Polar Bear Club dropped by the recording studio and tracked this awesome live version of See The Wind from their album Chasing Hamburg, out now on Bridge Nine records. The boys are currently wrapping up their US tour with Bad Religion (previous Hurley studios visitors).

Video: YB
